name: Gamestarter
description: Gamestarters is a blockchain-based crowdfunding platform that helps indie game developers to fundraise by pre-selling unique in-game assets in the form of NFTs. Additionally, Gamestarter provides a marketplace to trade digital assets from successfully launched games. Gamestarter's platform economy will run on GAME Coin ('GAME'), which will power all transactions on the platform as well as referral bonuses and reward programs.
